name: Gawr Gura: Shark Shark Panic!
description:
Double Trouble!

The Virtual World is in peril! An evil shark is going around and wreaking havoc! If that wasn't bad enough, guess who's taking the blame for it!

Join Gawr Gura, a shark with a heart of gold and a head of bone, as she runs, jumps, and dodges her way through Atlantis, a circus, and even a pirate's ship to clear her name!

There are plenty of evil enemies in her way, but Gura has a special way to defeat them, and his name is Bloop! toss Him at enemies to defeat them. He's more than happy to help!

Gura isn't doing this alone though, her friends are here to help! Meet Amelia Watson,  Calliope Mori, Takanashi Kiara, and Ninomae Ina'nis. Each of them have special abilities that can help Gura along the way! 

Earn back the trust of everyone, and prepare to face Gura's most menacing rival ever... Herself! 

It's non-stop action all the way to the end!

  • 6 Action packed stages with secrets to find!
  • 5 Gameplay styles!
  • Everyone is here!
  • Great for fans of Hololive, or retro platformers!
  • a

===============================================================

Based on properties owned by Hololive.

===============================================================

Demo coming soon!
